item.name: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

request.name: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

description.content: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

query.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
The numbers of items to return
The sort order (result is sorted by year)
Year the Nobel Prize was awarded, in the form of YYYY
Used in combination with nobelPrizeYear to specify a range of years to return results from. NobelPrizeYear is required
Language of output if format is csv (Default = en)

response.name: Successful call of Nobel Prize(s) according to the filled fields
Bad request.The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax, modifications needed.
Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.
Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

description.content: Information about the Nobel Prizes and the Nobel Prize Laureates
